General.Name: PBG SA
General.Description: PBG S.A. provides specialist contracting services for natural gas, crude oil, and fuel facilities primarily in Poland. The company operates as a general contractor or sub-contractor for engineering design, construction, repair, operation, and maintenance works in the areas of production of natural gas and crude oil; transmission of natural gas and crude oil; and storage of natural gas, fuels, liquefied natural gas, LPG, C5+, and CNG. It also produces boilers and environmental protection equipment for the power sector, as well as provides wet lime and semi-dry desulphurization systems. In addition, the company is involved in the construction of residential units, luxury apartment buildings, hotels, and commercial spaces; assembly and installation of prefabricated structures; assembly of metal structures; organization of real estate construction; and engineering activities. Further, it develops commercial and residential development; operates hotels and similar accommodation; and provides financial intermediation, engineering and related technical consultancy, and construction and process design services, as well as holds securities and investment assets. PBG S.A. was founded in 1994 and is based in Przezmierowo, Poland.

2.Name: Mr. Andrzej Stefan Gradowski
2.Title: Independent Sec. of the Supervisory Board
